findings.title: S3 Bucket Public Access Enabled
findings.description: S3 bucket 'acme-prod-assets' has public read access enabled, potentially exposing sensitive data.
findings.remediation: Disable public access on the S3 bucket by enabling the Block Public Access settings.
findings.evidence: Bucket ACL grants READ to AllUsers (http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers)

findings.title: EC2 Instance with Unrestricted SSH
findings.description: EC2 instance i-0abc123def456 has security group allowing SSH (port 22) from 0.0.0.0/0.
findings.remediation: Restrict SSH access to known IP ranges in the security group rules.
findings.evidence: Security group sg-12345 allows inbound TCP/22 from 0.0.0.0/0

findings.title: RDS Instance Publicly Accessible
findings.description: RDS instance 'acme-prod-db' is configured as publicly accessible.
findings.remediation: Disable public accessibility on the RDS instance and use VPC endpoints.

findings.title: IAM User with Stale Access Keys
findings.description: IAM user 'deploy-bot' has access keys not rotated in 180+ days.
findings.remediation: Rotate access keys for the IAM user and enforce key rotation policies.

findings.title: CloudTrail Logging Disabled
findings.description: CloudTrail logging is disabled in region eu-west-1, preventing audit trail.
findings.remediation: Enable CloudTrail logging in all regions.
